Name: Snowfall Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Take 1/4 a vanilla pod and cut along its length. MUDDLE this in the base of a shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: An alcoholic version of a vanilla milkshake with tiny black specs from the vanilla.
History: Originally called a Snowfall Martini and discovered in 2002 at Lot 61, New York City, USA.
